email_content.subject: Your journey to learn Rust and Build your First Blockchain

pt-BR.description:
Ol√°, futuro mago do blockchain! üåü

Pronto para mergulhar no mundo do Rust e blockchain, e dominar o SDK do Polkadot como um profissional? Este tutorial guiado √© o seu ingresso de ouro. Sabemos que o maior obst√°culo para construir seu primeiro blockchain com o SDK do Polkadot √© lidar com os recursos avan√ßados do Rust e decifrar a m√°gica por tr√°s daqueles macros bacanas do Substrate. Mas n√£o se preocupe, estamos aqui para ajudar!

Neste tutorial, voc√™ vai arrega√ßar as mangas e construir um projeto puro em Rust do zero. Voc√™ vai replicar todos os truques legais que o SDK do Polkadot usa, dando a voc√™ uma vis√£o clara do mago por tr√°s da cortina. Ao final, voc√™ ter√° uma compreens√£o s√≥lida do que est√° acontecendo nos bastidores.

Para quem √© isso?

  • Novatos totais em Rust üå±
  • Iniciantes em blockchain üí°
  • Mentes curiosas querendo desmistificar o SDK do Polkadot üîç

N√£o se preocupe se voc√™ ainda n√£o √© um guru de Rust ou blockchain. No entanto, um pouco de prepara√ß√£o ajuda bastante. Recomendamos fortemente que voc√™ d√™ uma olhada nos primeiros 11 cap√≠tulos do Livro do Rust (https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/). N√£o se preocupe em dominar todos os detalhes; apenas familiarize-se com conceitos como propriedade, tipos de dados b√°sicos, structs, enums, crates, tratamento de erros, traits, gen√©ricos e testes.

E ent√£o, voc√™ est√° dentro? Vamos embarcar juntos nesta aventura de codifica√ß√£o e desvendar os segredos da m√°gica do Rust e do SDK do Polkadot. Inscreva-se agora e comece sua jornada!
pt-BR.title: Domine Rust e Blockchain

en.description:
Hey there, future blockchain wizard! üåü

Ready to dive into the world of Rust and blockchain, and tackle the Polkadot SDK like a pro? This guided tutorial is your golden ticket. We know the biggest hurdle in building your first blockchain with the Polkadot SDK is wrestling with advanced Rust features and deciphering the magic behind those nifty Substrate macros. But don‚Äôt worry, we‚Äôve got your back!

In this tutorial, you‚Äôll roll up your sleeves and build a pure Rust project from scratch. You'll replicate all the cool tricks the Polkadot SDK uses, giving you a clear view of the wizard behind the curtain. By the end of it, you'll have a solid grasp of what's happening under the hood.

Who‚Äôs this for?

  • Total Rust rookies üå±
  • Blockchain beginners üí°
  • Curious minds wanting to demystify the Polkadot SDK üîç

No worries if you're not a Rust or blockchain guru yet. However, a little prep work goes a long way. We highly recommend skimming through the first 11 chapters of the Rust Book (https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/). Don't stress about mastering every detail; just get a feel for concepts like ownership, basic data types, structs, enums, crates, error handling, traits, generics, and tests.

So, are you in? Let's embark on this coding adventure together and unlock the secrets of Rust and Polkadot SDK magic. Subscribe now and start your journey!
en.title: Master Rust and Blockchain

Section_1.twitter: I just finished the first section of learning how to build a blockchain from scratch with Rust, guided by @web3dev_! üöÄ Now I know how to create and manage a balances pallet, add and manage state, store and read data, write basic tests, and implement balance transfers. Join me at https://build.w3d.community/ and let's build the future together! #RustLang #Polkadot #Blockchain #Web3
Section_1.submission_text: Take a screenshot of your terminal showing the successful transfer of balance and upload it below.
